title: Behavior Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA)
Interview Descriptions: Oversee mental health patients , check in admissions, discharges, meals and classes plus resources for the patients for discharge. Social work, living assistance benefits, medication management, transportation, services, and more
Interview Questions: It was a panel interview

title: Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was a group interview it was fairly easy. Everyone has an opportunity to speak and answer the questions. I’m not usually good with interviews but i did well
Interview Questions: How do you work under pressure?

title: Behavior Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Phoebe Putney in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: Be prepared and dress appropriately. Know why you want to sell yourself to this facility. Be honest about any past experiences. Highlight on your values and why you would be an asset to this team.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Certified Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was very easy I was called a couple of days after filling out application hr was very easy to commicqte with & managers were always a call away if I needed an answer
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself please

title: Critical Care Intensivist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: Multiple meetings, organized, people were good. They invited for site visit, were very responsible. Also gave community tour to get the feeling of the place. Overall had a good experience with the interview process.
Interview Questions: Open interview. Just normal conversation

title: PT/PTA Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: It was more about getting to know me as a person and a good opportunity to meet the team. I had an interview with a screener and then with the supervisors.
Interview Questions: What are your biggest strengths and weaknesses.

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: Interview was well but during a pandemic they should not be pulling off their masks.  That made me uneasy and decided to not take their offer otherwise I would have accepted.  Perhaps now that more people are vaccinated I would accept an offer.
Interview Questions: A lot about how to handle difficult people

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Welcoming. It is a panel interview and they will make an applicant feels that he/she is only hanging out with some friends. Random questions, just anything that you would not expect.
Interview Questions: Are you a friendly person?

title: Supply Chain Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed for a supply chain analyst role for Phoebe Putney. The interview was in person. It started w/ a panel of colleagues asking a few questions. That took 30-45 minutes. Nothing out of the ordinary there. Then they handed me a laptop and gave me a spreadsheet, with no context, and asked me to see what I could do with the data. That took another 30 minutes. I built a pivot table and showed them some filters, but it was challenging without any context as to what I should be looking for. I then talked with a manager. Total in and out was well over two hours, which seemed excessive for the role.
Interview Questions: Are you familiar with excel? Can you make a pivot table in excel?

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: The process of this interview was good and well organized. We met in front of the Starbucks and went over everything pertaining to the job. The questions were pretty simple and a overall good connection between the interviewer and myself was present.
Interview Questions: Tell me a little about yourself?

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: The nursing manager was a sweetheart! She interviewed me and provided a tour of the floor. She always introduced me to all of the staff, which I really appreciated.  The floor is a mixed unit of all types of patients due to the COVID 19
Interview Questions:
Behavior questions 
Schedule 
Tasks 
Vital signs

title: Lpn Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Apr 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was very efficient and timely. Pleasant and painless. Easy process. Very informative. Questions were appropriate for the job I was applying for. Interviewer was very polite and nice.
Interview Questions: What would I do if in a situation where the physician was being ugly to a patient?

title: Accounts Payable Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: Very easy, got an email to schedule phone interview, they called we talked for about 15 min or less. Very up beat interview.  He should get back to me in a few days to schedule face to face interview.
Interview Questions: Why Phoebe?

title: Medical Center Representative I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very fast and easy. I applied on Indeed and was instructed to complete a phone interview and survey, after I was finished, a few days later, I was contacted for an interview.
Interview Questions: Internet Survey

title: Safety Partner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions: Spoke with manager of my department. It was a well interview and straight to the point. I spoke to the manager and asked all the questions I need to ask and she was able to answer everything directly.
Interview Questions: Are you willing to work 12 hour shift?

title: Supply Chain Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA)
Interview Descriptions: phone interview then panel interview. the brought the entire leadership team in to talk with me. it was a very engaging and fun conversation. This is a very fun place to work and they have a great team
Interview Questions: what is your 5 year plan

title: Leadership Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: Was a very lengthy process where several illegal questions were asked. Maybe because the town is so small and they have a "good ole boy" system in place. Being from a city out of state and knowing that the things they were doing were illegal, I knew this was not the place for me.
Interview Questions: A lot of behavior-based questions

title: Executive Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and received an email the next day to schedule a phone interview. From the link, I selected the first available date which was 2 weeks away.  On the day of the interview, I received the phone call on time.  The process took about 20 minutes.  Casual conversation interview.
Interview Questions:
What prior experience do you have that makes your qualified for this job?
How would one of your co workers describe you?

title: Pct Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: Two interviews. One over the phone, and the other in person. Very quick takes 10 minutes over the phone. In person was 20 minutes. She never read my resume. They only tell you good things, they never tell you how disrespectful the nurses are to their techs. There is no teamwork. Management will ask the same question, “what can we do to improve nurse and techs relationship”. You tell them and they do nothing. Worse hospital to work for. Turn over rate high, everyone quits like 3-6 months in.
Interview Questions: What was my strength?

title: Patient Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: He was very easy he asked me questions I already have a direct answer to because I done this type of work.  It was a phone interview and if you fit for the job they would send you a email telling you what the next process of the interview and hiring process. But for what I hear it sound like a great company to be part of
Interview Questions: Why u want to work for this company

title: Senior Internal Auditor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview was pleasant, professional, about one hour. I have had dozens of interviews over the years. Lots of experience in this process. I have worked over 45 years in business, finance, auditing, tax, inventory etc.
Interview Questions: How many years auditing (25)

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: Online application then wait FOREVER to hear anything either way.  If you are "over qualified" you should "dumb down" your application to meet their requirements or you won't be considered.  It is more in WHO you know rather than WHAT you know.
Interview Questions: Typical questions about strengths and weakness, how to you handle problems with patients/co-workers, management, etc.

title: Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by the potential managers, nice enough. An offer was made, offer accepted, then offer rescinded due to a hiring freeze AFTER I had put in my notice at my other job, purchased uniforms, done my drug test.
Interview Questions: Can you handle multiple priorities?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: After applying for the job, I was promptly sent an email requesting I set up a phone interview with a recruiter. It is about 30 minutes in length, and was easy to do. Very low key and the recruiter was able to answer lots of questions right away. This is important if you want to find out what all the job entails if you are on the fence deciding if this position would even fit into your personal needs.
Interview Questions: Give me an example of a time you went above and beyond for a patient?

title: RPH Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Phoebe Putney
Interview Descriptions: Very laid back.  Interviewed with several people and the process took about 6 hours.  The questions were not hard, just basic get to know you information.  The people were nice and friendly.  HR person went over all the benefits right after interview was over.
Interview Questions: What is your interest?

title: Systems Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions:
Behavioral questions after survey taken over the internet. Next they 
Called in for interview. Took about 30 minutes only one person in interview. recruiter called a week later with offer. Negotiations took place and eventually got the salary I needed to leave current job. I was satisfied with it.
Interview Questions: How many times were you late in the last 3 months.

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in May 2013
Interview Descriptions: There was a nice group that participated in the interview. The staff seemed nice and the interview process was fairly straightforward. The team seemed to be very interested in how well I could help with managing productivity, and seemed very uptight about the financial management aspects of the role.
Interview Questions: What kind of performance improvements was I participating in currently.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Nov 2011
Interview Descriptions: Talked with manager about employment history, filled out paperwork! I met staff on unit. Took drug calculation test. Talked with human resources. Wendo nursing residency classes. Went perinatal classes. Met with preceptor. Worked secretary for admission information.?
Interview Questions: Experience

title: Systems Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 months. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Jan 2011
Interview Descriptions: Received call from recruiter.  Scheduled an onsite interview.  Met with Department Head initially.  Later in the day met with the team of analysts. The questions were hypothetical what ifs for things that did not apply to the actual position.  There was no clarification for the questions so you had no indication you were answering it they way it should be answered.
Interview Questions: If you had a doctors appointment but a crisis arose right before you were supposed to leave, what would you do?

title: Patient Safety Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Phoebe Putney (Albany, GA) in Jun 2010
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is somewhat drawn out. From the time a resume is submitted the process typically takes about 6 to 8 weeks. In my case it was 10 weeks. There is an initial phone interview with the recruiter. This was followed by group interviews with the Chief Operating Officer, Chief Nursing Officer and Chief Medical Officer. A week later I was scheduled  interviews with hospital directors of nursing, followed by a group interview with 4 members from the Risk Management team, followed by Quality, and frontline staff. The culture is interesting - Patient Safety is promoted from the CEO, COO, & CMO, the CNO is less concerned and focused on productivity.
Interview Questions: Aside from conducting the typical organizational survey, please identify specific steps you would take to improve the culture of safety, for inpatients, outpatients, visitors, and staff.
